page.title: 06THE FLOWER FESTIVALS
page.content: Every year, usually in spring,most villages in this area have a flower festival. There is a great local pride and rivalry between villages.The parish church and chaples are decorated with floral displays, almost exclusively done by women. Many visitors come from all over the country to admire the display. Very often the children are involved and there is usually a "theme" to each village festival. At the time of the festivals many of the fields have flowers in full bloom and these are sign posted as "Rural Rides" so that visitors can drive in their cars to see them.
